name: Frost Hymn
description:
in Frost Hymn you walk on frozen path from bonfire to bonfire. Dangerous beasts and cold weather haunt your journey. Every time you rest, a new sound accompanies you.

Craft your hymn for your travels and try to reach the end; the last bonfire.

I created this game in a two weeks time and ended up restricting myself to use only GameMaker's own draw functions.
Game is meant to be an semi-relaxing experience and requires minimum amount of skill.  Shortest game can be played under 7 min and longest around 30 min.

Keys:

Walk Left and Right : Arrow keys
Run : Hold R
Full Screen Toggle : Enter
Exit Game : Esc

Thank you for playing  : )
